definitions.definition: A great ancient Greek historian ( c. 460 BCE – c. 395 BCE ) and author of the History of the Peloponnesian War , which recounts the 5th century BCE war between Sparta and Athens to the year 411 BCE .

main_definition: A great ancient Greek historian ( c. 460 BCE – c. 395 BCE ) and author of the History of the Peloponnesian War , which recounts the 5th century BCE war between Sparta and Athens to the year 411 BCE .
